metadata.description:
you know that feeling when your sigNiFicant UDDER treats you like you've been together for too long even though you only met 50 years ago

and they are LITERALLY BEGGING YOU to stop with your shit. YES YOU MUST STOP.

sometimes you can feel like you're at your worst. some days you might be stuck in a dark, long corridor in your mind. 

sometimes you wish you could bring someone back.

there have been so many moments in my life when i thought everything was over and i was ready to leave. 

whenever things get overwhelming, you can look at your past and how lucky you are to still be here. if the past is not something you want to dwell on, just remember that anything could happen any day.

hope this warms your soul. 
much love.

some kind words that have been said about this song -

lyrics.text:
it's spoken today
you're hiding and you're broken this way

we're reaching this pavement
in this corridor inside of my head
i'm bleedin' metaphorically 
i'm draining myself till i'm dead
metaphorically i'm able to see that
we're going to places
like the green gable you read about 20 years ago
and i, i know
seems so far (so far away)
seems like cars never go - fast enough to get away
and they break down (break down they do)
we drop our crowns
and we fight to get back
we all fight to get back

metadata.name: i'm begging you #1
metadata.title: i'm begging you
